casebody.data:
Mark, Appellant, v. Mellott Manufacturing Company, Inc.; Frick Company, Appellee.

[Cite as Mark v. Mellott Mfg. Co. (1991), 57 Ohio St. 3d 601.]

(No. 89-1913 Submitted November 20, 1990 Decided January 2, 1991.) Stewart Jaffy & Associates Co., L.P.A., and Stewart R. Jaffy ¡Frank A. Ray Co., L.P.A., and Frank A. Ray, for appellant. Porter, Wright, Morris & Arthur, Patrick J. Smith and Joyce D. Edelman, for appellee.

This cause is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Sweeney, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., and Holmes, J., dissent and would affirm the judgment of the court of appeals. Douglas, J., dissents.
